meanings.sent1: The unrespectable behavior of the bully made the other students feel uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: The unrespectable actions of the thief landed him in jail.
meanings.sent3: It's hard to take someone seriously when they act unrespectable all the time.
meanings.sent4: The unrespectable condition of the old building made it unsafe to enter.
meanings.sent5: The unrespectable attitude of the customer made the waiter's job difficult.

meanings.sent1: The unrespectable company was known for its unethical business practices.
meanings.sent2: Living in an unrespectable neighborhood can sometimes be challenging.
meanings.sent3: The unrespectable rumors about the celebrity turned out to be completely false.
meanings.sent4: The unrespectable state of the park was a stark contrast to its former beauty.
meanings.sent5: She felt embarrassed by her unrespectable family members' behavior at the party.
